title: S of unskilled workers increases, wage falls

content.question: If a large number of unskilled workers enter the labor market, which of the following is most likely to occur in the labor market for unskilled workers?

choices.label: The supply curve will shift to the right and the wage rate will decrease.
The supply curve will shift to the left and the wage rate will increase.
The demand curve will shift to the right and the wage rate will increase.
The demand curve will shift to the left and the wage rate will decrease.
There will be a movement up along the demand curve and the wage rate will increase.

content.answer: The supply curve will shift to the right and the wage rate will decrease.

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
